dict.string: This is created by Poting Chiang. You can use this finction to Watch/Play photos that you have choosen and/or Listen to music that you have selected at the same time as well.

You can Save and/or Select photos that you like through here.
You also can lookup, add, update and delete your own photos' description through this function.

You can Save and/or Select Music that you like through here.
You can also lookup lyrics of songs in this app.

This function is allowed you to browse most popular internet social community.
Ex: Facebook, Twitter, Youtube and GitHub...

You can note down memos here and save your memo in the apple photo library.
You also can make an event reminder in apple calendar through this function.
It is a sample game from textbook

This shows your information and your location.
You can make changes in the "App Settings" and get your location by clicking "Map Icon".
And you also can change the background in this function through "App Settings."
This function introduces this app's all information and functions.
